answers.author: Stephen Driscoll
answers.text:
The City of Sparks, City of Reno, and Washoe County in Northern Nevada share in the delivery of over 60 services for our citizens (pop. 405,000) and visitors (est. 3,500,000/year). The services range from interlocal operating agreements to shared services to fully consolidated services.  I would be happy to discuss and send a full list.
Please contact me as follows:
Steve Driscoll
Assistant City Manager
City of Sparks, Nevada
775.353.1633   office
email to: sdriscoll@cityofsparks.us
Thank you.

answers.author: Mark Abeles-Allison
answers.text:
In Wisconsin our regional planning commissions are involved with local loan programs.  In addition they oversee CDBG ED and Housing programs.  It makes a lot of sense now that the programs are being regionalized at the state level.  I would think that the role of regional planning commissions should be growing now more than ever.  Alternate energy could be a great field on a regional basis.

author: David Biggs
text: I am looking for examples of shared services provided through a Council of Governments (COGs) organization, especially those services outside what may considered traditional like regional transportation planning, etc.  We are looking for ways to provide more value added types of activities to our local city members.
title: Shared Services through a Council of Governments
